RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'M A COOL CAT vied for the lead down the backstretch from three wide then was asked at the three furlong marker and took the lead at the five sixteenths pole and drew off. CENTAURUS was off the pace down the backstretch then made a three wide bid at the five sixteenths pole but was no match for the winner. THE RONALD shared the command from the inside to the top of the stretch and weakened but held on for the show. GOSPEL BONANZA shared the command from the two path to the top of the stretch and gave way. BIGPARTY NOWHISKEY was never a threat. KATRAKA was forwardly placed down the backstretch then dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: I'm a Cool Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, led 5/16, drew off,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 5800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STOLEN HALO tracked the leader to top of stretch then moved out to three wide in upper stretch and drove past. EXTRA SAUCE was off the pace through the turn then made a late rail bid and held the place. PRECIOUS ONE raced in the middle of the pack around the turn then made a three wide late rally and missed the place. LIL' MISS MISCHIEF sprinted to a clear lead to mid stretch and tired. NOBLE PRESENT saved ground to no avail. WEST COAST ANDY was always back. PRAIRIE FIREBALL remained back.

ENTRY.NAME: Precious One
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 3wbid, late rally, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Extra Sauce
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, late rail bid, held place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 6400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRIMSON T. tracked the leader while saving ground around the turn then slipped through at the sixteenth pole and prevailed. RETRO RITA went to the front to a clear lead into deep stretch and was caught in the final jumps. YA THINK was off the pace on the inside to mid stretch but was out finished late. PASSION RIDE raced near the back through the turn then showed late interest but was not enough. TALLANDLONG was off the pace from three wide to mid turn then dropped back. GOSPEL FAITH reared as the gates opened, rider lost iron and galloped in.

ENTRY.NAME: Gospel Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared start, lost iron, gallop in

ENTRY.NAME: Passion Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, late interest, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Crimson T.
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, saved ground, slip thru1/16, prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEY NOW dueled for the lead from three wide to the quarter pole and shook loose at the three sixteenths pole to prove best. ONE STEP AWAY dueled for the lead from between horses to the top of the stretch and weakened but stayed on for the place. CHAMPS SUCCESS tracked the leaders from the inside then moved out to four wide in upper stretch for a late run to be up for the show. GUNSLINGERS LEGACY dueled for the lead from the inside to the quarter pole and tired. THE GREATEST EAGLE had no speed and remained back. BRON AND THE BROW raced wide throughout and was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: One Step Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, weakened, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Now
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled for lead, shook loose 3/16, best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 6000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA ROSA DRIVE went to the front to co-lead from the two path to the quarter pole and edged away, lost crop at the three sixteenths pole but was kept to task and drew clear. LADY PHYLLIS vied for the lead from three wide to mid stretch but was no match for the winner and held of the late closing inside rival to keep the place. REMARKABLE CHARM raced near the back through the turn then moved between horses at the three sixteenths pole and made a late rally to just miss the place. IMA FINAL DE BUY went to the front to co-lead from the inside to the quarter pole and weakened. SNICKEL TE raced at the back through the turn then moved out to five wide in upper stretch and passed tiring rivals. HIGH VALUE TARGET was off the pace on the inside to mid turn, fell back and was not a factor. KALLINIKI was off the pace between horses and was shuffled back at the half mile marker then retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: La Rosa Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: co-led 2p, edged away, lost crop 3/16, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Phyllis
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3w, no match, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Remarkable Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, between 3/16, late rally, missed 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 14100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF A RACE IN 2023 OR NON WINNERS OF FOUR RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VIRTUALLY rushed up to take a clear lead and set all the pace, edged away at the top of the stretch and won going away. SUE ETTAS GHOST tracked the leaders through the turn then made a rail bid in the stretch to prove second best. ROCKIN MARIE sprinted away then settled off the pace through the turn but had no late kick. FLIPLIT trailed the field around the turn and passed tiring rivals. CHEROKEE PAPOOSE raced near the back in the early stages, moved up on the backstretch then moved between horses at the quarter pole but lacked the late response needed. FLO TIME was off the pace from three wide to the three furlong marker then dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Virtually
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, clear lead, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Cherokee Papoose
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, moved up, between 1/4, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Sue Ettas Ghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, rail bid, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Rockin Marie
ENTRY.OWNER: Long Vaughn Meyer Curtis and West Jeff
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint away, settled off pace, no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Front Range S. ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 111. Stakes Purse 21350. PURSE 21,350. Three Year Olds and Older. Weight three year olds 120 lbs. older 124 lbs. Runs: Saturday July 22 Enter: Saturday July 15. $50 to nominate. $200 to enter. Nominations close Thursday July 13.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COLLUSIONIST settled off the pace down the backstretch, moved out to three wide at the five sixteenths pole and engaged the leader at the top of the stretch and drove past to prove best. TRUTH SEEKER trailed the field to the five sixteenths pole while gaining ground around the turn, moved out to three wide in upper stretch for a late rally and just got up for the place. TULSA TIME went to a clear lead to set the pace for a half then was headed at the top of the stretch and fought gamely in the stretch but couldn't fend off the late closer and missed the place. SWEET MEDICINE chased the leaders and never made a bid. RAMBLIN' MAN was last away and roused to contention to prompt the pace to the five sixteenths pole but gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Ramblin' Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, prompt pace, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Collusionist
ENTRY.COMMENT: settle off pace, 3w5/16, engaged leader, drove past, best

ENTRY.NAME: Tulsa Time
ENTRY.OWNER: Vicchrilli Russell and McGregor Lynne M
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear lead, headed, fought gamely, couldn't fend

ENTRY.NAME: Truth Seeker
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, gain ground, 3wupper, late rally, just up 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Arapahoe Park Championship Challenge S. ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 440 Y Dirt CR: 95. Stakes Purse 48620. PURSE $40,000. Three year olds and older. Entry date for Trials July 1. Trials Saturday July 8. Entry date for Finals July 15. Finals Saturday July 22.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: A TRES OF EAGLE all out. INDEED veered in, game 2nd. JUST CALL ME JESS bumped, late kick. DF STORM TALES best of rest. PAINT YOUR FACE BLUE drifted out, improved. JESS NO SECRETS drifted in, no bid. NO TORIOUS restless gate, out kicked. IMPRESSIVE BROOK bumped, outrun.
